short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check YouTube video's views count for free without playing the video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing "YouTube Views Counter," the must-have Chrome addon for YouTube enthusiasts! This handy extension allows users to effortlessly check the view count of any YouTube video, completely free of charge. Stay informed about the popularity of your favorite videos with a single click, and never miss out on trending content. Enhance your YouTube experience with "YouTube Views Counter" today!
